resources.string: Yerevan is the capital and largest city of Armenia, known for its rich history.
Washington, D.C. is the capital city of the United States, famous for its landmarks.
Madrid, the capital and largest city of Spain, offers a lively cultural experience.
Paris, the capital of France, is celebrated for its art, fashion, and culture.
Tokyo, Japan\'s capital, combines tradition and technology in a unique way.
Warsaw, Poland\'s capital, has a dynamic history waiting to be explored.
